metadata.name: Single Hand Clapping 1/1
metadata.description:
A photograph of my Joe, taken near Lille in France in 2017.

This photo formed part of my exhibition in Singapore in 2018 entitled "Single Hand Clapping", a study of solitude and lonely figures weaved into the urban landscape.

Bio: Justin Lim is an internationally acclaimed photographer on IG as @hurtingbombz - his work has been featured by the main accounts of IG, 500px, Flickr, VSCO and more. He is "one of 21 global photographers who will change your IG experience" (creativebloq.com) and is a former IG suggested user. His clients include Prada, Chanel, Alexander McQueen, Tiffany & Co - he is also one of "HK's Best Wedding Photographers" (Tatler).
